message.name: ERR_SCOREOUTCOME_XFV_MINIMUM_SCORE_GREATER_THAN_MAXIMUM_SCORE
message.locale: The Minimum Score, %1n, should be less than or equal to Maximum Score, %2n.

message.name: ERR_SCOREOUTCOME_XRV_SCORE_OVERLAPS_WITH_SPECIFIED_OUTCOME
message.locale: The score range for outcome %1s (%2n, %3n) overlaps with the range specified for the outcome %4s (%5n, %6n).

message.name: ERR_SCOREOUTCOME_XRV_OUTCOME_SPECIFIED_WITH_SAME_RANGE
message.locale: An outcome, %1s, is already defined for this score range (%2n,%3n).

message.name: ERR_SCOREOUTCOME_XRV_MAXIMUM_SCORE_OVERLAPPING
message.locale: The score range for outcome %1s (%2n onwards) overlaps with the range specified for the outcome %3s (%4n onwards).

message.name: ERR_SCOREOUTCOME_XRV_SPECIFIED_RANGE_OVERLAPPING_WITH_MAXIMUM
message.locale: The score range for outcome %1s (%2n, %3n) overlaps with the range specified for the outcome %4s (%5n onwards).

message.name: ERR_SCOREOUTCOME_XRV_SPECIFIED_RANGE_OVERLAPPING_WITH_MAXIMUM_RANGE
message.locale: The score range for outcome %1s (%2n onwards) overlaps with the range specified for the outcome %3s (%4n, %5n).
